content: over top of the right needle this will distort the stitch making it look as if there are 2 stitches instead of 1 your yarn is now in the correct position to knit the next stitch but remember to keep firm gauge on the yarn for this stitch when you are ready to resume knitting in the round you will knit the two legs of all your double stitches together as if they are one stitch instructions using the smaller size needles and your preferred cast on method cast on 108 112 112 116 sts place marker and then join in the round being careful not to twist this marker is the beginning of the round for the entire body of the sweater and is placed at the centre back round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * across the round repeat this round 6 more times first increase round *k2 m1l repeat from * across round to give 162 168 168 174 sts change to larger needle and knit one round short row section row 1 rs k52 55 55 58 turn work and make ds row 2 ws purl to marker sm p 52 55 55 58 turn work and make ds row 3 rs k to marker sm k to 5 sts before last ds turns work and make ds row 4 ws purl to marker sm purl to 5 sts before last ds turn work make ds repeat last 2 row 3 more times next round knit to marker sm knit across round knitting the two legs of each ds together when you come to them the stitch count will not change yoke the next two rounds will form the chain pattern always slip your stitches purlwise with the yarn in front wyif of your work so that it will cross in front of the slipped stitch round 1 *s1 wyif p1 repeat from * across round round 2 *p1 s1 wyif repeat from * across round rounds 3-6 knit rounds 7-8 repeat rounds 1 and 2 round 9 second increase round in this and following increase rounds use the knit front and back into the same stitch to make the increases as
